subtext.part_1: who loves coding back & front and shares stories on stage.
subtext.part_2: I turn complex tech into playful, powerful experiences - whether I'm writing code, leading projects or inspiring audiences.

career.title: The Path
career.subtitle: Developer Journey
career.description: Here, you can follow my tracks on my tech journey

sunday.first: - Designed and implemented B2B user management with advanced search and update features [ReactJS, Typescript, Material UI]
sunday.second: - Build autonomous client-side order functionality, without initial staff or waiter intervention [ReactJS, Typescript, Java, Kotlin]
sunday.third: - Implemented robust navigation with native transitions, history management, and offline synchronization with local persistence [Kotlin Multiplatform, Swift, Android, Ruby, Kotlin, GitHub Actions]

op.first: - Implementation of a CMD+K search engine (based on the Slack model) [Elasticsearch, Laravel, Modular architecture, ReactJS, Material UI, REST API]
op.second: - Creation of 3 back-end and front-end libraries [Laravel, Typescript]
op.third: - Application technology upgrade (from Blade to React)

ox.first: - Preparation of new features in collaboration with the product team, following specifications

re.first: - Setting up the notification center for platform users [Laravel, Bootstrap, jQuery, MariaDB]
re.second: - Implementation of a tagging functionality based on Trello model [Laravel, Bootstrap, jQuery, MariaDB, AJAX]
re.third: - Implementation of a premium version with advanced features [Laravel, Bootstrap, jQuery, MariaDB, AJAX]
re.fourth: - Design adaptation of the platform (Responsive Web design)

pa.first: - Integration of payment service providers (REST API) and graphical interfaces allowing them to be used (PayPal, Stripe, Adyen, etc.) in OOP [PHP, C#, HTML/CSS, JavaScript]
pa.second: - Collaboration with various partners, foreign banks to integrate their payment services
pa.fourth: - Monitoring of operational maintenance of developed applications
pa.fifth: - Support management, reporting and tracking of incident tickets

fallout_on_passion.title: Which Fallout Faction Reflects Your Passion?
fallout_on_passion.subtitle: Fallout on Passion

info.title: What is it
info.subTitle: The Scale of Passion
info.first: Based on this <0>study</0> where Vallerand & al. designed a scale that aims to examine whether or not people are passionate about a given activity.
info.first_bis: And this, with answering to 17 assertions rating impressions on this assertions on a scale going from 0 to 7.
info.second: This is a coded version of it with a twist ! It is based on the game series Fallout.
info.third: So here, not only, would you be able to find out if your passion as a software engineer, web developer or programmer is harmonious or obsessive.
info.fourth: But the result of your test will contribute to a larger purpose.
info.fifth: The faction with the majority will shape an evolving landscape you can find on <0>here</0>.
